name: Import Portal Configuration
description: This task will import portal configuration to Power Platform Environment
author: Arpit
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: ApplicationId
inputs.label: Application Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value while doing app registration in Azure AD

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value while doing app registration in Azure AD

inputs.name: TenantId
inputs.label: Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value from Azure AD

inputs.name: PortalDataFolder
inputs.label: Portal data
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where your portal configuration is stored
